Module project
Package project.gui.minigame

Class M_TidyUpController

java.lang.Object
project.gui.SuperController
project.gui.minigame.M_TidyUpController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class M_TidyUpController
extends SuperController
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the tidyUp-mini-game You may click on the displayed items under the bed to "tidy them up" If all items are tidied up you can find a note which is added to your inventory and includes the computer password you were searching for

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void checkPasswordClickable()
    This method will add the password note to the inventory if all messy items are tidied up
    void fadeTransition​(javafx.scene.Node node)
    This method will display the opacity change of an image view and make it more visible
    void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)  
    void randomize()
    This method will randomize the layout of the mini game messyItems Array of Images which need to be tidied up randomImageViews Array of imageViews which need to be set randomly with images from messyItems messyItemList necessary to randomly assign an image to each imageView and delete it afterwords from the List, so no image of an item can be assigned twice randomMaxNumber equals the size of messyItemList, so the chosen image of the List is always in the position range of the generated random number
    private void setImages()  
    void setMouseCLickListener()
    This method will set ClickListeners to each imageView, so they can be tidied up and positioned at the side, after once clicked xPosition X-coordinates to assign each imageView a new position after it was clicked yPosition Y-coordinates to assign each imageView a new position after it was clicked computerPassword represents the "goal" of this mini game can only be clicked when all other messy items have been removed fade transition makes the element mor visible every time one item is tidied up add the Inventory.NOTE to the inventory

  • Method Details

    • setImages

      private void setImages()

    • randomize

      public void randomize()
      This method will randomize the layout of the mini game messyItems Array of Images which need to be tidied up randomImageViews Array of imageViews which need to be set randomly with images from messyItems messyItemList necessary to randomly assign an image to each imageView and delete it afterwords from the List, so no image of an item can be assigned twice randomMaxNumber equals the size of messyItemList, so the chosen image of the List is always in the position range of the generated random number

    • fadeTransition

      public void fadeTransition​(javafx.scene.Node node)
      This method will display the opacity change of an image view and make it more visible
      Parameters:
      node - the image view which opacity should change

    • setMouseCLickListener

      public void setMouseCLickListener()
      This method will set ClickListeners to each imageView, so they can be tidied up and positioned at the side, after once clicked xPosition X-coordinates to assign each imageView a new position after it was clicked yPosition Y-coordinates to assign each imageView a new position after it was clicked computerPassword represents the "goal" of this mini game can only be clicked when all other messy items have been removed fade transition makes the element mor visible every time one item is tidied up add the Inventory.NOTE to the inventory

    • checkPasswordClickable

      public void checkPasswordClickable()
      This method will add the password note to the inventory if all messy items are tidied up
